website_summaries.verdict: For those who need a versatile belt that's both rigid and flexible.
pros: Flexible inner belt is comfortable against the body while outer belt offers rigid stability
cons: Extra bulk makes it hard to get through some belt loops

customer_reviews.title: Good belt, holds without shifting.
customer_reviews.text: The inner belt is flexible enough to not be uncomfortable. The outer belt is nice and stiff, as it should be. I was worried about the size. I wear size 30 jeans and ordered a 34 belt to make sure it was big enough. With my holster and 4 mag pouches added the 34 was just right. I use the Blade-Tech Tek-Lok gear which adds a little bit to the length needed. I wouldn't want to go any smaller. If you run a 3-gun setup you may want to go even larger to accommodate the space the shotgun shell holders take up.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: A really solid belt
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 competition belts but this one from blade tech is much nicer than the one from Ghost Hybrid. Inner belt is actually pretty rigid, outter belt is super rigid. I use it for USPSA and it holds mags and holster up easily. Someone showed me a trick that really helped with this belt in particular. Set the outter belt up so it connects on your back, it will keep bulk down in the front where you are working and be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great gun belt.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a belt for pistol and 3 gun competition. There are two straps: 1) A Velcro belt that threads through your pants belt loops. The outer side has Velcro. 2) Outer firm nylon belt that mounts the accessories. Once performed, you overlap the outer nylon belt, aligning it with Velcro, to secure. There is a Velcro strap that serves as a belt buckle but it just keeps the straps secure. This is sturdy and stiff. It fits very well. It is recommended to go one size up from your conventional belt size. I went two sizes larger, and I was still okay. Overall, it's a great system for your holster and magazine carriers.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle VisionTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: My first real gun belt
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I had no idea how awesome a gun belt could be. There's an inner belt which you wear like a normal belt, and an outer belt that you clip all your equipment onto (holsters, pouches, etc). The outer belt simply sticks to the inner belt via heavy duty velcro. Both the inner and outer belts are firm, and feel great. What looks like a belt buckle in the photo is actually just decorative... you don't have to use it. Sizing is important. I wear a 44 waist, so according to Bladetech, I needed to order a 46 belt. I'm happy to report that Bladetech's advice is right on the money regarding sizing. You have to go up.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great competition shooting belt!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first competition shooting belt and used it on the range for 6 hours. It felt great, natural and most importantly secure. I run it with it my Gen 2 Glock 32 and 5 ammo pouches, so it was fully loaded for the USPSA event I attended. I did purchase a less expensive 2 color belt on here for another set-up for my Glock 26. I sent it back and will be buying another Blade-Tech. I love my Blade-Tech holster I have too.
customer_reviews.author: Richter Scale Studios

customer_reviews.title: On Again, Off Again!
customer_reviews.text: The idea of a two piece belt is intriguing. Half the belt stays on your pants while the other half carries your gear. The two velcro together making it easy to take gear on and off without having to undo a belt. There is a bit of a problem trying to get the inner belt tight enough to feel like it's holding up your pants. You would position your gear on the outer belt and then lock the two together. The Blade Tech holster mounts OK but the mag pouches need to be adjusted for a thicker belt. It is easy to strip off your gear though and then, go into town!
customer_reviews.author: Ron R. Glaeseman

customer_reviews.title: Good belt, no major compliants
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Comfortable for what it is (but they aren't made to be comfortable. The velcro belt keepers (supplied with belt) suck, recommend a platinum belt keeper for the outer belt and the velcro as extra security to bind the outer to inner belt. After a few accessories were slid on it has begun to fray in a few spots, recommend against moving gear around on it excessively.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good solution!!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to use a pistol holster and two pistol magazine holster and AR15 magazine holster on the same belt which is used to hold the pants - with all the pant loops in the way... and trying to drive a car with all the gear on between the stages at this hour range was simply not working. This is a great solution - inner belt goes in your pants and holds them up. Outer belt gets all the gear, and it just velcros over the inner belt. All the gear stays in place, and it can be removed in 2 seconds. Exactly what I needed for the range!
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Great for competitive pistor/revolver.
customer_reviews.text: I'm just getting started in competition pistol/revolver matches, and this belt is perfect. Be sure to order 2-4 inches larger than your actual waist size (I have a 32in waist, and the 36in belt fits great with a Blade-Tech competition holster and 2 dual magazine holders and wearing heavy-duty cargo pants)
customer_reviews.author: T.M.

customer_reviews.title: Better options for the money.
customer_reviews.text: For the money the quality on this belt is not good... there are far better options for the money. Stitching on the inside of the outer belt is barely on and the center of the outside is already fraying right out of the package. There are cheaper belts on here with better quality or spend just a few dollars more and get a double alpha or cr speed belt... i needed something asap for a match and this was able to be had quick and it was very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: angelr15

customer_reviews.title: Great starting point
customer_reviews.text: I bought this belt after my first 3 gun match, and have been using it for 3 seasons so far. It has worked out great, and has been a great value for what i spent for it. It is sturdy, easy to put on and take off, and none of my "stuff" on my belt moves (at least not enough to impede me yet). Granted, my skill level is not that high yet, but I'm definitely improving. I see this belt sticking with me for quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: Good competition belt
customer_reviews.text: Decent sturdy inner and outer belt and very convenient for setting up your rig and taking it on and off. One tip, if using blade tech tekloks or similar, get yourself some industrial velcro and put it on the back of the attachments to increase the attaching area. This is especially important if you are running a very busy belt for 3 Gun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best value in a rigid competition belt
customer_reviews.text: Best value in a rigid competition belt. Definitely cheaper belts available but this one is worth spending a few more bucks. There are also better belts but IMO they arent necessarily worth the much higher price tag. I say this already having an inferior cheaper belt and a superior more expensive belt. I would get more of these if I needed more comp belts.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Ockizard

customer_reviews.title: doesn't look like it will last more than a couple years
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be holding up alright, doesn't look like it will last more than a couple years, i wouldn't consider it bomb proof but its a nice belt for the money.
customer_reviews.author: JerDerv

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic 3-gun Belt
customer_reviews.text: First off... you should order 2 sizes up from what you wear in pants. I wear a size 34" in pants & had ordered a size 36" belt & although it might have worked, I just felt that it was a little too snug a fit with what I have so far for 3-gun ammo holders & holsters. I exchanged the 36" belt for a 38" belt and it fits sooooo much better. The belt is fantastic... holds all my 3-gun stuff like a glove and it's so easy to adjust. If you are getting into 3-gun competition you need a belt like this. Also, the return - exchange - new belt process took less than a week.... very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Rose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect competition belt
customer_reviews.text: It is stiff, but not too stiff and well made. It will ultimately depend on your preferences. I find this belt to be the perfect balance between stiffness and comfort for me. If you like very stiff competition belts, the one from shooters connection will be more to your liking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic belt for IPSC competition
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the performance for the price. Outer belt locks securely with hook and loop to inner belt. Outer belt is stiff and thick, securely holding and allowing holster and mag carriers to mount securely. After an entire afternoon of competition, the belt did not move at all. Incredibly secure and comfortable. Amazing value for the function and peace of mind it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Garthamatic

customer_reviews.title: Very Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for USPSA. I think it is adjusted the way I want it, but I have not used it in a competition. It has several adjustments so I have tinkered with it quite a bit. The cut on the front is perfect for a red dot sight. I am running a Sig P320X-Five and it has decent retention and allows a smooth draw. I would recommend this to anybody wanting to utilize a 1.5" competition belt. In case you are wanting this for carry or duty then you will need a different holster.
customer_reviews.author: MDP

customer_reviews.title: Blade-Tech belt and attachments
customer_reviews.text: Best belt idea yet! I wear the inner in my belt loops - it does take a little practice to get it snug. The outer is easy-on/off to attach to the inner, but you are much better off to put the belt/holster, and 3-gun pouches on first,THEN holster the pistol and add all the magazines and 12 ga shells. The full compliment of pistol, 5 magazines, two 30 rd AR mags, and eight 12ga shells is quite a load. The belt holds all of it very firmly in place.
customer_reviews.author: craig collins

customer_reviews.title: This belt is absolutely fantastic. The inside belt is worn as a regular ...
customer_reviews.text: This belt is absolutely fantastic. The inside belt is worn as a regular belt. The outside belt can be set up with your gear and stuck on just before you enter the range. Worn snug there is NO movement in your rig. Blade-Tech has done a great job with this one! I wish they sold the inner belt separately. It is the most compfortable belt I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: IceHawk

customer_reviews.title: Must have for even for the recreational match shooter
customer_reviews.text: This makes going to the shooting matches so much easier. No more having to thread a belt through pant loops, attach a mag puch, loop through another loop, attach another mag pouch... Just put on the inner belt, and slap the outer belt on with all our carriers and holster in place. I added peel-and-stick velco to the mag carriers and holster to give more grip on the inner belt.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Fitment right for my built.
customer_reviews.text: Got the 32inch size, normally am 29-30 waistline, feels sturdy, and i think will be a good beginner competition rig, good buy, will recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Belt that gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Great competition style belt. Love the 2 piece design, set the outer shell up to your liking, then it's a quick on and off, no having to adjust...ever. Holds my pistol, and 5 extra mags no problem. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jae

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: Its my first belt like this. Just figured if it was good enough for gun owners it was good enough for what I needed it for. Works good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris t

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with products and services...
customer_reviews.text: Works VERY well. Bought this for my wife and had to cut it down a bit to get a precise custom fit. Hung a Blade Tech Eclipse holster on it for my wife. Served my wife VERY well during her combat shooting class and she was ALL OVER the course ... and in many active positions. Very pleased with the products and AMAZON services.
customer_reviews.author: XXXXXXXX

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shooting belt.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for action pistol shooting along with 3-gun and it works perfect. I run a bladetech/511 holster and double magazine setup along with taco pouches for carbine mags, it stays put and is infinitely adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Boy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Belt is nice and sturdy but pushing things onto the belt can cause the material to separate. Would be nice if they could put some sturdy material on the end that would stop this seperation/freying.
customer_reviews.author: starrman73

customer_reviews.title: Great Competition Gun Belt; Quality matches higher priced units
customer_reviews.text: This belt is a great piece of gear for those people shorting organized gun matches such as IDPA or USPSA. Plus, it costs less than many other comparable belts. It is stiff enough that the belt does not flex when you are wearing your holster, mag pouches, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Coldbrew

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality.  Convenient and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: As a Patriot member of Front Site I wanted to have a professional quality holster that I could use for years to come. I did some investigating and found out that Front Site recommended the Blade-Tech Classic OWB. I ended up getting the Blade-Tech Classic OWB with the Tek-Loc. I then ordered the Velocity belt. I am very pleased with both products. The holster is working well and the belt is very sturdy and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Warhorse

customer_reviews.title: Performs exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: First competition belt and I really like it. I’m a 36” waist and ordered 38” belt and it fits great. It’s very rigid and seems durable enough to last a long time. I ordered a Blade Tech holster and double mag holster for a gen 4 Glock 21 and they attach to the belt securely and everything fits and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T.

customer_reviews.title: Met Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, delivery was fast, product was without blemish.... This review would be more valuable after I have had a year to abuse it...lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great belt. I love mine.
customer_reviews.text: I love this belt and would reccommed it to anyone! I love Blade Techs products. Top knotch quality and construction.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt
customer_reviews.text: This belt works great. The velcro is holding up well. i have had no issues with it coming loose while moving around in matches. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Helmbrecht

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just started in competitive shooting and wanted a good sturdy belt to hang my holster and mag carrier. It's perfect so far.
customer_reviews.author: Webster

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck 8/10
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast, Good quality no major problems. But it is a bit flimsy, ex. Holding the outer belt up “closed” on its own with a holstered g17 on the opposite side it sags quite a bit. This is noticed when also wearing it with the inner belt. But it is a great bang for your buck option! Ran it while running and gunning, Velcro stays in place. I would recommend this to anyone just getting into uspsa.
customer_reviews.author: (404) Not Found

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.text: Changed my competition life plain and simple. If you compete in any shooting sport do yourself a huge favor and make the purchase of a double belt system like this one or its major competitors and you will be very glad. This specific belt is sturdy and well made and a breeze to put on and take off. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: G. Uribe

customer_reviews.title: You had me at CRAFTSMANSHIP!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this ahead of a competition. Wore the inside belt all day. I can't imagine not having this from here forward. I paired this with one of their holsters. Great stitching, great stiff insert, velcro top quality. I even got a heads up by their customer support on the length to buy . She nailed it with the experience they've had with fitting people to their product. Customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: RandallC

customer_reviews.title: ruggedness of the belt.
customer_reviews.text: The Bladetech Two piece pistol belt I ordered is a high quality product. I love the thickness of it, stops it from sagging. This is my sixth Bladetech product. Ihave purchased five holsters and now the belt. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S

customer_reviews.title: Great belt for the price
customer_reviews.text: This belt is my first and it really holds up really well with all of my mag holders full of ammo. 3 competitions in, and still works great. I do recommend putting Velcro hook on the back side of your mag holders to better secure them to the inner Velcro belt. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: after about a month the Velcro on the end of ...
customer_reviews.text: after about a month the Velcro on the end of the outer belt started to peel off from the tip.
customer_reviews.author: saming

customer_reviews.title: Nice belt
customer_reviews.text: Nice belt at a good price. Comfortable and holds a heavy load with no issue. It is easy on and off if you don't want to carry your loaded gear between stages.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great belt
customer_reviews.text: What a huge difference when it is time to gear up for competition. Already have inner belt on when I leave the house, then just velcro outer right on to inner belt. All mag holders, holster, and any other equipment is already right on outer belt and exactly where I need it. Easy to adjust location of holders if needed. Definitely worth every dime.
customer_reviews.author: JW-INFIDEL

customer_reviews.title: Works great. The Velcro seems funny to me ( it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The Velcro seems funny to me ( it belongs on kids and old people shoes) but it functions perfectly. Its easy to swap out holsters or mag pouches for different competitions/trainings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and comfortable belt.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and comfortable belt. I am new to the 3 Gun world but it Blade Tech seems to be a standard. I like how easy it is to take the outer (gear) belt off and on. There are cheaper (and also more expensive) ones out there but this works for me.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Great Velcro two piece one belt with Velcro and another ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Velcro two piece one belt with Velcro and another that sticks to external belt - very stiff 1.5 inches width make sure to grab extra length since it will hold some of your accessories-holster mag holder etc
customer_reviews.author: Michael V. Thein

customer_reviews.title: I think this gun rig is under valued for this price.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first competition pistol rig. It fit me perfectly. It holds everything very firmly. I can’t even feel the weight, after I mount my pistol and all mags.
customer_reviews.author: TIMOCAT

customer_reviews.title: Missing Velcro
customer_reviews.text: Looked great, very rigid and comfortable. Only problem is that it came with missing Velcro, unable to secure inner to outer waist band.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit belt
customer_reviews.text: I use the inner belt everyday and it is a perfect fit for me. The outer belt is very good also. Just stiff enough to not flex in-necessarily.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This gear was more than I expected. I would highly recommend this to not only first time shooters but to those seasoned shooters. Five Stars for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: good quality and good thing i order this size
customer_reviews.text: good quality and good thing i order this size. I am a 34 but this is a 38 with a good over lap.
customer_reviews.author: Nonielanie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, great fit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, great fit, and gives a solid base for my wonderful Blade-tech holster. You do not want any sloppy pieces competing. This gives you a very solid feel even with the weight of your mags and piece. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sly Gray Fox

customer_reviews.title: First Gun Belt ordered
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly how I ordered it. If you are a size 38 waist then order the 42. It has great velcro hold and makes a great intro belt for running and gunning!
customer_reviews.author: CamoJak

customer_reviews.title: This belt is great for competition shooting.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing a thick leather belt for holstering my pistol at the club steel shoots I attend. I decided to give this Blade-Tech belt a try and couldn't be happier. I can leave my holster and mag holders attached to the outer belt all the time and just pop it on and off the inner belt as needed. It's really nice and stiff too.
customer_reviews.author: Rod. Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: I like this gun belt.
customer_reviews.text: Once adjusted, it is very comfortable belt for shooting handguns.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mikheyev

customer_reviews.title: Love the belt
customer_reviews.text: Love the belt. Rigid, easy to put on and take off and going a size up was a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Range Therapy

customer_reviews.title: 3gun Ready.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this belt. The fit and finish is very good. Very sturdy belt. I will be using this in 3 gun comp.
customer_reviews.author: Tbone

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product so far haven't used for competition yet but just trying it on feels very secure and stout. I ordered 2 sizes bigger worked perfect could have probally went 3 sizes. Deffinently measure your waist I were 32 pants measures out to a 36inch belt. And will deffinently hold your pants up if tighten. And blade tech teclok clips work perfect on this belt
customer_reviews.author: Ben Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great belt for the money. Works well and carries everything I put on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good during practice
customer_reviews.text: First competitive belt I've purchased to start shooting 3gun. Inner belt goes thru belt loops and outer belt holds accesories and velcros to inner. So far so good during practice. Agree with rec to buy 1-2 sizes bigger than your usual belt size.
customer_reviews.author: kyle c.

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to my setup
customer_reviews.text: Good addition to my setup. After using my Blade Tech belt, one of my shooting buddies immediately purchased one also.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan B

customer_reviews.title: Great belt, stiff enough to support all my 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great belt, stiff enough to support all my 3 gun gear, XDm with BT Revolution holster, 2 AR mag holders and three Invictus shotgun shell caddies
customer_reviews.author: Ski Killset

customer_reviews.title: Great belt, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This belt is stiff enough to hold the gun/holster in place and is comfortable to wear as well. I have worn it without a holster too.
customer_reviews.author: Bob F

customer_reviews.title: fits great with plenty of overlap with 3 pistol mag holders
customer_reviews.text: I wear 36 waist pants, ordered 40 size gun belt, fits great with plenty of overlap with 3 pistol mag holders, 1 AR mag holder and 2 8rd Shotshell holders , plus my pistol holster. Very secure and plenty stuff to support everything, very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, no major complaints,
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, no major complaints, Velcro attaches securely, not sure if I would purchase again...might spend a few more dollars and get something else. Good product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: NH Old person

customer_reviews.title: Inner and outer belt. Order 1 - 2 sizes up.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 38-40 , (depending on how much I eat every week) . I took everybodies advice and got a 44 in the belt. Glad I did. Fits great! Could have made it just fine with a 42 but wanted a little extra overlap.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered on time. Ordered to exact size ands fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great holster belt
customer_reviews.text: Works well with the Blade Tech holster I purchase. Use it regularly, no problems, no complaints. Would recommend to others for sure.
customer_reviews.author: 3tech

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: I added a couple of inches for overlap. I didn't need to it was long enough. Sturdy and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work very well--it is very sturdy and holds all of my gear without sagging.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph L. Clatterbuck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great belt, very stiff as needed and easy to adjust. For the right size follow the ordering instructions .
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Buy it and enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Loving it. Still loving it. It helped me get through many pistol competition stage. There's nothing more to describe it. Get it and love it
customer_reviews.author: Hollandking

customer_reviews.title: When choosing sizes
customer_reviews.text: This belt was for my speed belt setup. Works perfect. I was being cautious when I picked sizes and went up a size than I would normally wear in jeans. Good thing I did! Fits perfect and I think any smaller would have been too small
customer_reviews.author: Trent Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Best belt money can buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of them, one for me, and one for my teenage son. We both shoot IDPA we could not wish for a better belt. It is snug and holds your holsters tight. It is the best belt I have ever had and I have had several.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great competition belt
customer_reviews.text: Works great as advertised, runs bigger than actual waist size. I assume thats intended for all the gear and equipment you'll be attaching. I definitely would buy again and highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome belt.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome belt. The inner/outer belt design makes it very convenient for moving/swapping your gear around for different competitions/stages.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Highly recommend this belt.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Glad I jumped up two belt sizes as recommended in a review by another satisfied buyer. Keeps all your gear where you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do it!
customer_reviews.text: These belts are the bomb. 1.5" so the first layer fits through any pants/shorts belt loops. 2nd layer makes it easy to clip on/remove accessories. If you're considering buying, consider no more - do it.
customer_reviews.author: Trackrocket

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality,, Not bad looking with the pseudo buckle. It holds things in place well.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Warwood

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's just like I've read in other reviews.. works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Rohn M Schuster

customer_reviews.title: and you are good to go
customer_reviews.text: I got this to keep all of my competition gear on it and it holds solidly. You can pick up the belt, snap it on, and you are good to go. Once you are done you can just rip it off and you are fine. I have not had any issue with my gear moving when it is on or in storage. It feels secure when it is on too.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great belt for shooting sports
customer_reviews.text: Had been recommended by others. It fits the bill so to speak. It is well constructed and functional...
customer_reviews.author: Son John

customer_reviews.title: holster and pistol comfortably. It is also very comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: The belt is stiff enough to hold my magazines, holster and pistol comfortably. It is also very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made -- have other AA belts and this compares favorably
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent belt
customer_reviews.text: Belt is exactly what I thought it would be and I’m very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: N. Santos

customer_reviews.title: A quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Wish there was a good way to cinch it tighter, but overall, it does what it is supposed to. Mates up well with the Teklok connectors.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Competition Gun Belt
customer_reviews.text: Excelent . Used for USPSA and IDPA and all equipment stays in place
customer_reviews.author: Marlin3030

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff holds my p320 full size 6
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff holds my p320 full size 6, 23 Rd mags and my ear pro, with no issues of sagging of flexing. Sizing is 2in above your waste size if you have a 30-32in waste get the 34in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Nice belt. Very stiff, hook n loops work great, very nice for the money. I measured my waist at 48 inches, but ordered a 46 anyway. Ended up working out perfectly, since there is PLENTY of overlap.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great belt for matches
customer_reviews.text: Everything exactly as described.. Great belt for matches, holds all the gear on 3 gun great...
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: Get the best.....
customer_reviews.text: Great holster..I use your holsters for USPSA in multiple platforms..
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Go 2 sizes larger and youll be fine.
customer_reviews.text: Fits as described. Go 2 sizes larger and youll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: IT Pro's

customer_reviews.title: well made, Decent, but a bit flimsy for a competition belt
customer_reviews.text: well made, Decent, but a bit flimsy for a competition belt

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Great belt for attaching holster and mag holders for competition use.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lau

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Good product; well made; recommend. I use it as a range belt and it works very well. Makes holster, mag holder, or other belt accessory easier to swap-out. Took me two tries to get the correct size. First try was too large.
customer_reviews.author: MFB

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great belt for hanging multiple accessories from. Been using it now for thee months and it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great belt. Very stiff and holds all gear nicely. Also very convenient to take on and off, while still having a "belt."
customer_reviews.author: C. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Good first velcro belt
customer_reviews.text: First Velcro dual belt seems to work ok, still getting used to using it in competition.
customer_reviews.author: CkRed6s

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This belt works perfectly. No issues yet. Holds a holster and 3 double mag holders.
customer_reviews.author: G C

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job pretty well. Only really con is that I've had ...
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job pretty well. Only really con is that I've had this about 3 months and I've already seen the loop portion of the under-belt fraying a bit from being taken on and off. Doesn't appear to be affecting functionality.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM H ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Good Belt highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great belt, sturdy on a par with others i have owned, would recommend. as with all Competition belts, consider getting one size up
customer_reviews.author: David Houghton

product_meta.title: Blade-Tech Competition Gun Belt
product_meta.description: Blade-Tech Competition Speed Belt This two-piece competition belt is designed for easy on, easy off operation with a rigid design to hold all of your Blade-Tech shooting gear. Great for USPSA and 3Gun matches. Measure your waist. Take that number and go to the next size. If your waist measures 38-Inch, Order a 40-Inch. If it measures 37-Inch, order a 40-Inch. The extra 2-Inch is for the extra space from the inner belt, pouches and holster. If you follow this guideline it will not fail. DO NOT use your pant size.
feature_bullets: Two-Piece Construction - Allows for easy on easy off applications during competition
Outer belt is stiffened with the help of reinforced liner
Inner belt designed to feed through belt loops on pants, while outer belt holds the gear safe and secure
A necessity for USPSA and 3-Gun competitors

To find size, please take your pants size and add 2-4". This overlap will ensure that all your mag pouches and holsters will fit, while still allowing extra space for leftover hook and loop to adhere to one another
Two-piece competition belt is designed for easy on, easy off
Rigid design to hold all of your Blast Tech shooting gear
